channel.title: TGRoss
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGRoss, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: This is Signaling More Gains Ahead
item.description: Hey, Ross here! I just pulled a chart that compares investor sentiment to how close the S&P 500 is to all-time highs—and the gap right now is striking...

item.title: Don’t Get Scared Out of the Market
item.description: Hey, Ross here! I’ve gone back through decades of data to see how the S&P 500 performed after major geopolitical shocks - everything from Pearl Harbor...

item.title: Major Opportunity Window Just Opened
item.description: Hey, Ross here! Retail bulls are finally outnumbering the bears—but they’re late to the party. The market’s been flashing strength for weeks. Now, ins...

item.title: The Bears are in Retreat
item.description: Hey, Ross here! Investor sentiment is finally starting to catch up with price action. The latest AAII survey shows bears in retreat after months of do...

item.title: The Fate of the “Average” Stock
item.description: Hey, Ross here! The S&P 500 may be charging toward all-time highs—but under the surface, the average stock is barely moving. Year-to-date, the average...
